metadata.purpose: Ultra-realistic AI image generation prompts and workflows

image_generation.name: Nano Banana Pro
image_generation.notes: JSON-structured prompts work best, more detail = better results

image_generation.name: GPT Image / DALL-E
image_generation.notes: Less consistent for character identity across images

image_generation.name: Flux
image_generation.notes: Good for skin texture and lighting

video_generation.name: Kling 3.0
video_generation.notes: Single prompt workflow, 15s cinematic scenes with audio

video_generation.name: Sora 2
video_generation.best_for: Full video ads from single prompt

character_consistency.prompt: Use the attached reference sheet as the absolute ground truth for the subject's facial features, skin texture, and body proportions. The output must be a 1:1 match of the character provided. The subject is the woman from the reference image.
character_consistency.usage: Attach a character reference sheet with multiple angles/expressions

prompt.prompt: Photorealistic 8K full-body portrait of beautiful young woman, early 20s, slim athletic build with elegant natural curves, smooth olive-toned skin...
prompt.notes: Continue with specific details about pose, lighting, environment

product_imagery.system_prompt: You are a professional product image extraction specialist. Your purpose is to extract products from supplier images and create a clean, reusable, high-quality asset.
workflow: User uploads supplier image + specifies product
product_imagery.use_case: Turn low-quality supplier images into high-quality studio shots

midjourney_style_refs.description: Monochromatic biomechanical horror rendered with hyper-fine fibrous textures, stark high-contrast lighting, and a cold sculptural realism that fuses organic forms with eerie minimalism and existential dread.

character_consistency: Create a reference sheet with multiple angles of your character
Include: front view, side profile, 3/4 view, different expressions
Use the reference sheet as 'ground truth' in every prompt
Specify exact features: facial structure, skin texture, proportions
For video: use start and end frame references
realistic_output: Describe skin texture: pores, slight imperfections, natural sheen
Include lighting details: natural, soft, directional
Mention camera/lens type for photographic realism
workflow_efficiency: Use JSON-structured prompts for Nano Banana Pro
More detail = better results (don't be sparse)
2-3 reruns typically needed for best output
Lock face in from start rather than matching after
